name: Slide The Block
description:
The Blocks need you! Help them meet their halves in this fun, interactive slider puzzle. Even though the goal is simple, the journey will be full of fun challenges!

Move the Blocks around until you can match the red Blocks. Test your brain and figure the puzzle out quickly because every move counts!

Improve your problem-solving skills while you slide away the hours. Prove your brilliance and unlock various Block Buddies' playbox, all packed with hours of fun and challenge!

Block Buddies Features:

Beat the Puzzle!
• Slide the Blocks around and match the red Blocks so they can be BFFs!
• Just remember, every move counts. Move the blocks less often to beat your own high score

Test Your Brain
• Slider puzzles are a great way to kill time and improve cognitive thinking
• Enjoy hundreds of fun puzzle levels
• Unlock various Buddies' playboxes for more challenging puzzles!

Self-made Goals!
• Complete one Block Buddies' playbox to unlock another!
• Make goals to unlock as many playboxes as possible, or to collect top scores (3-stars) in each and every puzzle!

Can you unlock the puzzle and reunite these fun Buddies? Come on, test your brain and your puzzle skills in Block Buddies, the interactive slider game that improves cognitive thinking!

Download now to start matching Blocks!
